1370: Folkero was born in Trysgens in 1370.
Got married to Emmelina at age 26 in 1370.
Had a son with Emmelina, Adolfus, at age 26.
1372: Had a son with Emmelina, Arnekin, at age 28.
1373: Had a daughter with Emmelina, Zuanelt, at age 29.
1375: Had a daughter with Emmelina, Lutghardis, at age 31.
1378: Had a son with Emmelina, Gerart, at age 34.
1380: Had a son with Emmelina, Bartrarde, at age 36.
Lost son Gerart when Gerart was 3 years old.
